```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Less than:

```R
my_number <- 74

if (my_number < 100) {
    print(paste(my_number, "is less than 100"))
}
```

```
Rscript if.R

[1] "74 is less than 100"
```

Equal to:

```R
my_number <- 74

if (my_number == 100) {
    print(paste(my_number, "== 100"))
}

if (my_number == 74) {
    print(paste(my_number, "== 74"))
}
```

```
Rscript if.R

[1] "74 == 74"
```

Not equal to:

```R
my_number <- 74

if (my_number != 100) {
    print(paste(my_number, "!= 100"))
}

if (my_number != 74) {
    print(paste(my_number, "!= 74"))
}
```

```
Rscript if.R

[1] "74 != 100"
```
